Name: Conan Doyle
Ingredients: 60 ml Island single malt Scotch whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A literary riff on a Corn'n'Oil - elementary but tasty. As the ice melts and dilutes this cocktail so the falernum notes amplify and the cocktail mellows and opens.
History: Discovered in 2008 at Tonic Bar in Edinburgh, Scotland. Originally made with Talisker Island single malt Scotch whisky.
